edu.bu.battleship.game

Class Game.GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bu.battleship.game.Game.GameView
  • Enclosing class:
    Game

    public static class Game.GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a "view" into the game. A player's "view" into the game contains only the information that a player can see. Most importantly, an object of this class contains complete fleet information about ships under the player's control, and only partial information about the opponent's fleet. A player only knows what ships from an opponent's fleet they have sunk, and only the number of remaining ship types that an opponent still still has under their control. A GameView also has a grid of Outcome enum values stored in a 2d array. If the Outcome value is null at a coordinate in the 2d array (a Coordinate's x-position indexes the rows, and y-position indexes the columns), then that coordinate has not been "fired upon" by the player's fleet yet.

      • getEnemyShipTypeToNumRemaining

        public final java.util.Map<Ship.ShipType,java.lang.Integer> getEnemyShipTypeToNumRemaining()
        A getter method to get information on how many ships of certain types the opponent has remaining.
        Returns:
        The map of ship type (key) to number of unsunk vessels remaining under the opponent's control (value).

      • getEnemyBoardView

        public final EnemyBoard.Outcome[][] getEnemyBoardView()
        A method to get the 2d array of Outcomes. This 2d array contains all outcomes of prious guesses. An Outcome enum value can be either a HIT, MISS, or SUNK. When indexing this 2d array using about Coordinate object, the x-position indexes the rows and the y-position indexes the columns.
        Returns:
        The 2d array of Outcome enum values encoding prior guess feedback.

      • getGameConstants

        public final Constants getGameConstants()
        A method to get all of the Constants pertaining to this game. Important constants are the difficulty of the game and board dimensions.
        Returns:
        The Constants object containing game-specific constants.

      • getTimeLeftInMS

        public final long getTimeLeftInMS()
        A method to get the number of time (in milliseconds) that this player has remaining to think.
        Returns:
        The time (in ms) that this player has remaining to think for the entire game.
